name: Exposed Vocals
overview:
Exposed Vocals is a musical platform designed to let unsigned artists upload their music videos. Once their video is uploaded, our teams of promoters immediately start distributing their video link across the web, generating thousands of views. Additionally, members get FM radio spins, major publication features and music demo and press pack submission to record labels. This is all done 100% free to all members. In the first year, Exposed Vocals community blew up like a fire storm with their video library generating over 5 million views and a community of thousands of members worldwide. Currently, there are thousands of videos available to instantly stream for free, no registration required. Exposed Vocals has been gaining tremendous online stream and has earned their place as #1 community for Unsigned Musicians to go and get the exposure they have worked so hard for.

http://www.exposedvocals.com
